rows.label: tlk41700321_03_msg0001
rows.name:
I'm the official representative
of the Gulan in Torigo.
The Chief, if you like.

rows.label: tlk41700321_03_msg0002
rows.name:
I always thought it was just a title,
but since that Morph was removed
from his post, I've had tons to do.

rows.label: tlk41700321_03_msg0003
rows.name:
In the olden days, Chiefs like me would
meet together with the High Chief to
decide on all the affairs of Gula...

rows.label: tlk41700321_03_msg0004
rows.name:
But since we became a territory of
Superbia, most of that governing
business has fallen to them.

rows.label: tlk41700321_03_msg0005
rows.name:
Today's Gulan people don't
have the know-how to run a proper
government of our own.

rows.label: tlk41700321_03_msg0006
rows.name:
It's taking everything I have just to
keep this city's daily affairs in check.

rows.label: tlk41700321_03_msg0007
rows.name:
I always thought we'd be better off
without that no-good consul, but
maybe he had some skills after all...
